SELECT ba.id AS id, ba.title AS title, ba.update_time AS time, ba.content AS content, bi.file_path AS imageUrl, ba.category_id AS category, c.name AS categoryName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM save_list_article sla WHERE sla.article_id = ba.id) AS savedCount, (CASE WHEN ep.id IS NOT NULL THEN true ELSE false END) AS editorsPick FROM blog_article ba LEFT JOIN blog_image bi ON ba.banner_img_id = bi.id LEFT JOIN category c ON ba.category_id = c.id LEFT JOIN editor_picks ep ON ba.id = ep.article_id AND ep.status = 1 WHERE ba.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY savedCount DESC LIMIT #{topN}
